item.description:
UPDATE: Presenters include LA Fuess, SGH (talking about a very detailed structural model for an existing building) and Derek Gilbert, a structural technical specialist (talking about Revit and AutoCAD Structural Detailing Integration".

This meeting with focus on structural vertical integration, starting in Revit. Presentations may include:

- structural analysis
- collaborating with architectural firms
- preparing files for transfer fabricators

This meeting will be informative for architects, engineers and CMs alike - and really anyone using Revit. The structural vertical integration is the most progressive in the industry, so it truly forecasts how all trades will be able to work in the future.

We are still scheduling presenters, so if you would like to present on a topic relating to vertical structural, please email lhandler@tocci.com

Meeting will be from 6-8.
item.name: Structural Vertical Integration (From Design to Fabrication to Build)
